sentences.en: Equally notable was the failure of Mr Mugabe , their commander - in - chief , to comment on their snub.
sentences.cn: 同样地, 他们的 总司令 穆加贝先生的失败也确定无疑.

sentences.en: He nested his snub face on the sheets beside her and they cried together.
sentences.cn: 他挨着她把扁脸贴在床单上,两人哭作一团.

sentences.en: He took the opportunity to deliver us another snub.
If he isn't a All - Star next season, it will definitely be a snub.
sentences.cn: 如果下赛季他不能入选全明星, 那肯定是受到了冷落.

sentences.en: If he isn't a All - Star next season, it will definitely be snub.
sentences.cn: 如果下个赛季他不能入选全明星阵容, 那将会听到质疑之声了.

sentences.en: Ryan took it as a snub.
sentences.cn: 瑞安觉得这是一种怠慢。

sentences.en: She was the prettiest girl in the room, snub - nosed, scrubbed, smart, slender, dear.
sentences.cn: 她是这屋里头最漂亮的姑娘, 短短的鼻子, 收拾得干净利索; 一副聪明相, 又苗条又可爱.

sentences.en: Snub - nosed monkey lives mainly in trees, but also on the ground looking for something to eat.
sentences.cn: 金丝猴主要在树上生活, 也在地面找东西吃.

sentences.en: the boys who had snubbed her in high school
sentences.cn: 在中学里曾经冷落她的那些男孩

sentences.en: The Driller is to ensure all rig tongs have two snub lines attached for safety.
sentences.cn: 司钻要确认每个大钳有安全尾绳,以确保安全.

sentences.en: The German move was widely seen as a deliberate snub to Mr Cook.
sentences.cn: 德国方面的举动被普遍视为对库克先生的有意怠慢。

sentences.en: The lack of official comment is seen as a snub to Australia.
sentences.cn: 由于缺乏官方评论被看作是怠慢澳大利亚.
那种怠慢明显是故意的.

sentences.en: There is one of rare animals Yunnan snub - nose monkey, lesser panda.
sentences.cn: 其中珍稀动物有滇金丝猴 、 小熊猫.

sentences.en: Which one coould take snub like this lying down?
sentences.cn: 像这样的怠慢谁能不放在心上 呢 ?

sentences.en: Yang appears to have taken the snub in her stride.
sentences.cn: 杨似乎对自己遭受的冷遇并不在意.

trans.tran_cn: 冷落，怠慢，斥责，突然的停止
trans.tran_en: If you snub someone, your behaviour or your remarks can be referred to as a snub
to treat someone rudely, especially by ignoring them when you meet

trans.tran_cn: 冷落，拒绝，挽桩滞缆而刹住（船等），掐灭（例如香烟）
